lizagar.title: li_zagar_tan
lizagar.task:
Task:
The client only had an Instagram profile for bookings. The goal was to build a digital presence from scratch to look professional and stand out from competitors.
lizagar.solution:
Solution:
Developed a premium design from a blank canvas, built a multilingual platform (LT/RU/EN) using Next.js 15, and integrated Treatwell booking widget along with a Supabase-powered gallery.
lizagar.result:
Result:
The client received a fully functional premium platform. The site looks expensive, converts traffic into leads, and builds trust (4.9★ from 73 reviews).

q1.question: How long does it take to create a website?
q1.answer: On average, from 2 to 5 days, depending on the complexity of the project and the availability of your ready materials (texts, photos).

q2.question: What if I don't like the design?
q2.answer: Before the final launch, we approve the layout. I make iterations of edits so that you are completely satisfied with the result.

q3.question: How does the payment work?
q3.answer: The payment is divided into two parts: a 50% advance payment before starting the work and the remaining 50% after the approval and launch of the site.

q4.question: Do I need to pay for website support later?
q4.answer: The 'Full Launch' package includes 1 month of support. After that, you can either administer the site yourself (it's easy) or request one-time paid assistance.
